alert.note: Alert for Fort Bend; Inland Harris; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:31PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Fort Bend, southeastern Waller and west central Harris Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 531 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Addicks Park Ten, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Katy, Addicks Park Ten, western Eldridge / West Oaks and Cinco Ranch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
